name: Mischief Kittens MV Version
description:
Maple and Cookie are excited for the upcoming Halloween Festival! They’ve come up with a prize winning costume, when suddenly the signature piece has been stolen! Help our girls fight and bribe their way through the forest, to find the missing mask!

You can download the soundtrack from Elezeid HERE!

And if you want to see more of Karpo's work, you can go HERE and HERE!

Original done by Karpo

MV Conversion done by Sight21
